entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add non-allocating overload of JsonEncodedText.Encode that allows the caller to own the memory #68747
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.DateOnlyConverter and System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter classes #68743
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TryUpdateOrRemove for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #68742
  • The msftbot account locking conversations is annoying #68740

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #68565
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter class #68744
  • Converting to `DateOnly/TimeOnly` from string #59253
    7.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'NLog.Web.AspNetCore, Version=4.0.0.0' #68720
  • [API Proposal]: Add equality operations on string for ReadOnlySpan<char> #68746
  • Segmentation fault with linux--arm64 self contained hello world console app #68731

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert RsaPaddingProcessor to statics #68749
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary throwOnPrematureClosure in ManagedWebSocket. #68745
    area-System.Net
  • Remove GTF_GLOB_REF on a few more addressing nodes #68741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid string-related allocation from GetCSharpString in XML serializer #68738
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • JIT: fix loop recognition in OSR PGO methods #68725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix RegexCompiler regression on 32-bit for some set matching #68655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocation in Process.GetProcessesByName #68705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Clean up some debug-only code in Regex #68721
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Simplify AssemblyName marshalling between VM and CoreLib #68735
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers version #68724
    area-Meta
  • [MONO] Refactored code into marshal-ilgen and marshal-shared. #68656
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mitigate stress hangs by marking GC-sensitive tests as out-of-proc #68733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • Delete unmanaged AssemblyName parser #68737
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call methods with byref parameters, e.g. this #1873

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • GenerateDepsFile Build Error: An item with the same key has already been added. #12473
  • GenerateDepsFile: The process cannot access the file '...\MyProject.deps.json' because it is being used by another process. #2902
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • Add native aot test with EnableAotAnalyzer set to false #25125

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MSI workload garbage collection #25155
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Add back build retry #25141
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01

Updated

  • Feature propsoal: Allow use of override keyword on interface method implementations. #3510

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `cref` block is disallowed when the referenced member of type contains any unconstrainted generic argument with nullable annotation #61076
  • Add more detailed scopes to C# language rules, to allow finer syntax coloring control #61074

Closed

  • The NotNullWhen attribute is not respected for out parameters #61073

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #61070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Do not suggest possible member names for unbound async identifier #61075
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Make NamingPreferences message-pack serializable #61006
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61072
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor route parameters not work with custom type #41467
  • Using filter (IRouteHandlerFilter) in minimal API throws exception #41464
  • Web Api properties of type long (Int64) are incorrectly serialized by some rounding #41463
  • Different behavior on json parsing errors in mvc and minimal apis #41459
  • Can't uninstall ASP.NET 5 RC1 Update 1 #41456

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41462
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41461
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41460
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41458
    area-runtime
  • Add rule to seal internal and private types #41457

Merged

  • [release/7.0-preview4] Revert "Try out 1es images" #41466
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • !fixup! Reference Html.Abstractions projects #41413
    area-infrastructure
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recyclerview support #6725
  • Improve the Migration guide #6724
  • Remove WebView2 Requirement, or Remove WebView2 data gathering #6723
  • Content Page- Disappearing event not fire #6722
  • Failed to build "xcrun exited with code 69" and "Class AppleTypeCRetimerRestoreInfoHelper is implemented in both" #6721
  • DisplayAlert / DisplayActionSheet / DisplayPromptAsync inconsistent Async suffix #6720
  • MAUI - Publish brand new project produces errors #6719
  • .NET Maui Shell colors behavior is not the same as Xamarin Forms and difficult to comprehend #6718
  • Publish MAUI Project with project reference To Class library produces errors. #6717
  • Shell TabBar Page Navigation in Appearing causes Page to Raise Appearing twice #6716
  • PropertyChanged causes COMException (Catastrophic failure) when application is closing #6715
  • xaml grid content on windows not fit (stretch) after window maximize (or after window size increase with mouse borders drag) #6714
  • Custom font cannot work for Android on RC2 #6712

Closed

  • views overlap on image in Grid and Vertical StackLayout #6590
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - Image with AspectFill does not appear inside some Layouts #6365
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] Width or height of Editor control can't be set #6414
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Merged

  • Set image clipping when content mode is scaleAspectFill #6690
  • Set Image ClipRect at origin when using AspectFill #6692

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
